name: Cabot Oil & Gas Corporation
description: Cabot Oil & Gas Corporation is an independent oil and natural gas company focused on the exploration and production of hydrocarbons. Founded in 1989, Cabot has established itself as a key player in the energy sector, particularly in the Marcellus Shale region, which is one of the most prolific natural gas fields in the United States. The company is headquartered in Houston, Texas, and has a commitment to sustainable practices and environmental stewardship. Cabot utilizes cutting-edge technology and innovative drilling techniques to optimize production while minimizing environmental impact. The company’s strategic focus on natural gas aligns with the growing demand for cleaner energy sources, as natural gas is considered a bridge fuel in the transition to renewable energy. With a solid financial foundation and a track record of operational excellence, Cabot is well-positioned to capitalize on the evolving energy landscape. The company’s mission revolves around delivering value to its shareholders, providing energy to its customers, and contributing positively to the communities in which it operates. Cabot is also engaged in efforts to reduce greenhouse gas emissions and promote sustainable practices throughout its operations, reflecting its commitment to responsible energy development.

seo.meta_title: Cabot Oil & Gas Corporation | Independent Oil and Natural Gas Producer
seo.meta_description: Explore Cabot Oil & Gas Corporation, a leader in the exploration and production of natural gas. Learn about Cabot's commitment to sustainable energy and operational excellence.

faq.question: What does Cabot Oil & Gas do?
faq.answer: Cabot Oil & Gas is focused on the exploration and production of oil and natural gas, particularly in the Marcellus Shale region.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Cabot Oil & Gas?
faq.answer: Dan O. Dinges is the CEO of Cabot Oil & Gas Corporation.

faq.question: Where is Cabot Oil & Gas headquartered?
faq.answer: Cabot Oil & Gas is headquartered in Houston, Texas, USA.

faq.question: What are Cabot's main products?
faq.answer: Cabot's main products include natural gas and natural gas liquids.

faq.question: When was Cabot Oil & Gas founded?
faq.answer: Cabot Oil & Gas was founded in 1989.
